data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
OpenSST is a generic message and protocol to create transaction.
    Transaction can be signed, crypted and some specific information.
    The main issue is OpenSST could be part of multiple Namespace like
    Crypt:: or Signature::... But is more a generic encapsulated
    message. So OpenSST seems a better choice.
